title: The Google Nest Hub still remains a fantastic addition to any smart home
content:
I’ve been using the Google Nest Hub (2nd Generation) since it was released. While I was a fan of it when I received it, I’ve only grown to love it even more. There’s a lot that it can do that I’m surprised by, and it has surprisingly become one of the most used pieces of

The post The Google Nest Hub still remains a fantastic addition to any smart home appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Google Nest Hub is still a fantastic addition to any smart home, and we've found that it integrates nicely into Google's ecosystem.
